Detailed Description

Namespace regrouping all the hardware description.

Filename : BeBoard.cc Content : BeBoard Description class, configs of the BeBoard Programmer : Lorenzo BIDEGAIN Version : 1.0 Date of Creation : 14/07/14 Support : mail to : lorenzo.bidegain@gmail.com
